data.text:
Wasim Rizwi chose to do the Ghar wapasi on a day which is celebrated as Shourya Diwas in Bharat, as the encroached structure over the Shri Ram Janmabhumi place was freed by Hindus on the same day in 1992.

Total Views |

Sayyad Wasim Rizwi, the ex-Shia Waqf Board chief, embraced Sanatan Dharma & became Jitendra Singh Tyagi on 6th December 2021. This Day is also celebrated as Shourya Diwas in Bharat, as the encroached structure over the Shri Ram Janmabhumi place was freed by Hindus on the same day in 1992. Wasim Rizwi chose to do the Ghar wapasi on this very day is significant. The shuddhi ceremony was conducted at Dasna Devi Mandir near Gaziabad under supervision of Mahamandaleshwar Yati Narsinghanand Giri of the Dasana Mutt.
